text: Three ships of the Royal Navy have borne the name HMS Albany: * was a 14-gun sloop launched in 1745 and captured by the French in 1746. *HMS Albany was a 14-gun sloop, launched in 1744 as . She was renamed HMS Albany in 1747 and was sold in 1763. * was the ex-American Rittenhouse. She was purchased in 1776 and broken up in 1780. ==See also== * * Category:Royal Navy ship names
title: HMS Albany
